title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 905.7 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 905.7 - Severability

State Regulations

The provisions of this part are severable. If any provision
of this Part, or any application thereof to any entity or circumstance, is
found to be invalid, such invalidity shall not affect any other provisions or
applications of this Part that may be given effect without the invalid
provisions or applications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
905.7

Adopted

New

York State Register November 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 48, eff. 11/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
